      • createAccount

        public void createAccount(BankCustomer newCustomer)
        Add a new BankCustomer element to the HashMap.
        Parameters:
        newCustomer - The new element to add to the HashpMap using the account number as the key and the new BankCustomer as the value.

      • deactivate

        public void deactivate(java.lang.String accountNumber)
        Deactivates a customer's account
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - the account to be deactivated

      • deposit

        public void deposit(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                    double amount)
        Gets the BankCustomer from the HashMap and adds a double amount to a BankCustomer's balance.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - The account number of the BankCustomer.
        amount - The amount to deposit.

      • withdraw

        public void withdraw(java.lang.String accountNumber,
                     double amount)
        Gets the BankCustomer from the HashMap and subtracts an amount from a BankCustomer's balance as long as it does not leave a negative balance.
        Parameters:
        accountNumber - The account number of the BankCustomer.
        amount - The amount to subtract from a BankCustomer's balance.

      • displayCustomerInformation

        public static void displayCustomerInformation(BankCustomer customer)
        Displays the details of a BankCustomer element in the HshMap. Uses BankCustomer.toString() implementation.
        Parameters:
        customer - the BankCustomer chosen to display.

      • displayAllCustomers

        public static void displayAllCustomers()
        Displays all elements of the HashMap by using BankCustomer.toString() implementation of each.
